channel.title: Clicks.java

item.title: Clicks.java
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

hey, i made a java file caled clicks.java and i need help with make the file acctually do something look at this simple class

	public class Clicks{
	public void setIt(int items, int ID){
   	client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[ID];
	if(c.playerHasItem(items)){
	switch(items){
	case 133:
	c.sendMessage("CHECK!");
	break;
	
	case 739:
	c.sendMessage("I wouldn't want to drink this!");
	break;
	
	case 1038:
	c.deleteItem(1038, c.getItemSlot(1038), 1);
	break;
				}
			}
		}
	}

i want so when i click 133 (def potion (3)) it will send the check message can i get help?
Ty.

Read full topic
